# Blinds and Curtains Dubai

> A premier window treatment provider in Dubai specializing in custom blinds, curtains, and shutters for residential and commercial spaces.

## Business Overview
- **Industry:** Window coverings, blinds & curtains
- **Founded:** Approx. 2010s
- **Website:** https://blindsandcurtains.ae/
- **Description:** A trusted window treatment store in Dubai offering premium blinds, curtains, shutters, and installation services with free consultations and custom solutions.

- [Home](https://blindsandcurtains.ae/)

- [Sitemap](https://blindsandcurtains.ae/sitemap.xml)

## Core Products & Services
- **Motorised Blinds:** Custom smart control options for modern homes.
- **Blackout Blinds:** High-density fabrics designed for maximum light blockage.
- **Roman & Roller Blinds:** Stylish, functional fabric solutions.
- **Vertical Blinds:** Classic solutions for large windows and offices.
- **Custom Curtains:** Includes sheer, blackout, and designer styles.
- **Shutters:** Premium window shutter installations.
- **Free In-Home Consultation:** Expert measurements and samples brought to the customer.
- **Installation:** Professional end-to-end fitting and after-sales care.

## Key Differentiators
- Over 20 years of industry experience.
- In-house production ensuring strict quality control.
- Free consultation and measurement service across Dubai.
- 4.9+ star reputation on Google (794+ reviews).

## Contact Information
- **Phone:** +971 4 252 2025
- **Email:** sales@blindsandcurtains.ae
- **Address:** Unit 43 22nd St, Al Quoz Industrial Area 4, Dubai, UAE

## Project Highlights
- **Al Barsha:** Residential window coverings.
- **Arabian Ranches:** Specialized blinds and curtains projects.
- **Business Bay:** Commercial and residential installations.
- **Palm Jumeirah:** High-end custom luxury solutions.
